20101216170037.000|20101216170039.500|CCO|BUT HE UNDERSTOOD HOW DIFFICULT 
20101216170039.500|20101216170042.000|CCO|THE MISSION THAT HE HAD BEEN 
20101216170042.000|20101216170044.500|CCO|GIVEN WAS, AND HE THREW HIMSELF 
20101216170044.500|20101216170047.000|CCO|INTO IT WITH EVER FIBER OF HIS 
20101216170047.000|20101216170049.500|CCO|LARGER THAN LIFE BEING.

20101216170052.000|20101216170055.333|CCO|SUCCESS, AND HE AND HIS TEAM --

20101216170106.000|20101216170108.000|CCO|LEADING ONE OF OUR CIVILIAN 
20101216170108.000|20101216170110.000|CCO|ATTEMPTS IN KANDAHAR FOR A YEAR,
20101216170110.000|20101216170112.000|CCO|AND DAN FELTMAN, WHO HAS BEEN

20101216170118.667|20101216170122.000|CCO|FORWARD.

20101216170132.000|20101216170134.500|CCO|FAIR TO REMIND US'S INHERITED AN
20101216170134.500|20101216170137.000|CCO|EXTRAORDINARILY DIFFICULT 
20101216170137.000|20101216170139.500|CCO|SITUATION.
20101216170139.500|20101216170142.000|CCO|THERE WAS NO COHEREIN STRATEGY.
20101216170142.000|20101216170144.500|CCO|TO UNIFY AMERICA'S EFFORTS IN 
20101216170144.500|20101216170147.000|CCO|THE REGION.
20101216170147.000|20101216170149.500|CCO|THERE WAS KNOW CLEARLY DEFINED 
20101216170149.500|20101216170152.000|CCO|MISSION, AND OUR PEOPLE, BOTH 
20101216170152.000|20101216170155.333|CCO|OUR MILITARY AND OUR CIVILIAN 
20101216170155.333|20101216170158.667|CCO|FORCES LACKED THE RESOURCES THEY
20101216170158.667|20101216170202.000|CCO|NEEDED TO GET ANY PROGRESS 
20101216170202.000|20101216170204.500|CCO|ACCOMPLISHED.
20101216170204.500|20101216170207.000|CCO|TODAY WE HAVE A DIFFICULT STORY 
20101216170207.000|20101216170209.500|CCO|TO TELL.
20101216170209.500|20101216170212.000|CCO|PRESIDENT OBAMA ANNOUNCED A 
20101216170212.000|20101216170214.000|CCO|STRATEGY A YEAR AGO THAT DEFINED
20101216170214.000|20101216170216.000|CCO|A CLEAR COMMISSION AND COMMITTED
20101216170216.000|20101216170218.000|CCO|THE RESOURCES NEEDED TO 
20101216170218.000|20101216170220.000|CCO|ACCOMPLISH IT.
20101216170220.000|20101216170222.000|CCO|TODAY'S REVIEW SHOWS THAT WHILE 
20101216170222.000|20101216170224.500|CCO|WE FACE SERIOUS CHALLENGES AS 
20101216170224.500|20101216170227.000|CCO|THE PRESIDENT HAS JUST OUTLINED,
20101216170227.000|20101216170229.500|CCO|KEY PARTS OF OUR STRATEGY ARE 
20101216170229.500|20101216170232.000|CCO|INDEED WORKING WELL.
20101216170232.000|20101216170235.333|CCO|IN PAKISTAN, WE HAVE MOVED 
20101216170235.333|20101216170238.667|CCO|BEYOND A PURELY TRANSACTIONAL 
20101216170238.667|20101216170242.000|CCO|RELATIONSHIP DOMINATED BY 
20101216170242.000|20101216170245.333|CCO|MILITARY COOPERATION.
20101216170245.333|20101216170248.667|CCO|PAKISTAN AND THE UNITED STATES 
20101216170248.667|20101216170252.000|CCO|HAVE BEGUN A LONG-TERM 
20101216170252.000|20101216170254.500|CCO|COMMITMENT TO WORK TOGETHER NOT 
20101216170254.500|20101216170257.000|CCO|JUST ON SECURITY, BUT ON ENERGY,
20101216170257.000|20101216170259.500|CCO|AGRICULTURE, EDUCATION HEALTH 
20101216170259.500|20101216170302.000|CCO|AND OTHER AREAS THAT DIRECTLY 
20101216170302.000|20101216170304.000|CCO|AFFECT THE DAILY LIVES OF THE 
20101216170304.000|20101216170306.000|CCO|PAKISTANI PEOPLE.
20101216170306.000|20101216170308.000|CCO|THERE HAVE BEEN, THERE WILL 
20101216170308.000|20101216170310.000|CCO|CONTINUE TO BE OBSTACLES AND 
20101216170310.000|20101216170312.000|CCO|SETBACKS, BUT OUR CONCLUSION IS 
20101216170312.000|20101216170313.667|CCO|THE PARTNERSHIP IS SLOWLY BUT 
20101216170313.667|20101216170315.333|CCO|STEADY IMPROVING.
20101216170315.333|20101216170317.000|CCO|WE HAVE GREATER COOPERATION AND 
20101216170317.000|20101216170318.667|CCO|UNDERSTANDING, AND THAT IS 
20101216170318.667|20101216170320.333|CCO|YIELDING TANGIBLE RESULTS ON THE
20101216170320.333|20101216170322.000|CCO|GROUND.
20101216170322.000|20101216170324.500|CCO|IN AFGHANISTAN OUR SURGE IS NOT 
20101216170324.500|20101216170327.000|CCO|SIMPLY MILITARY.
20101216170327.000|20101216170329.500|CCO|WE HAVE EXPANDED OUR PRESENCE 
20101216170329.500|20101216170332.000|CCO|FROM 320 CIVILIANS LESS THAN TWO
20101216170332.000|20101216170334.000|CCO|YEARS AGO TO 1,100 TODAY.
20101216170334.000|20101216170336.000|CCO|ACCOMPLISHING OUR MISSION 
20101216170336.000|20101216170338.000|CCO|REQUIRES CLOSE COOPERATION 
20101216170338.000|20101216170340.000|CCO|BETWEEN OUR CIVILIANS, OUR 
20101216170340.000|20101216170342.000|CCO|TROOPS AND OUR INTERNATIONAL AND
20101216170342.000|20101216170343.429|CCO|AFGHAN PARTNERS.
20101216170343.429|20101216170344.857|CCO|WE HAVE WORKED TOGETHER TO 
20101216170344.857|20101216170346.286|CCO|ARREST THE MOMENTUM OF THE 
20101216170346.286|20101216170347.714|CCO|TALIBAN.
20101216170347.714|20101216170349.143|CCO|CIVILIANS HAVE BEEN PARTICULARLY
20101216170349.143|20101216170350.571|CCO|INSTRUMENTAL IN THE PROGRESS WE 
20101216170350.571|20101216170352.000|CCO|HAVE SEEN IN HELMAND AND 
20101216170352.000|20101216170353.667|CCO|KANDAHAR, AND THEY WILL BE 
20101216170353.667|20101216170355.333|CCO|ITICAL IN HELPING US 
20101216170355.333|20101216170357.000|CCO|CONSOLIDATE THE GAINS WE HAVE 
20101216170357.000|20101216170358.667|CCO|MADE IN THE LAST YEAR, AS WE 
20101216170358.667|20101216170400.333|CCO|MOVE TOWARD A TRANSITION TO 
20101216170400.333|20101216170402.000|CCO|AFGHAN RESPONSIBILITY.
20101216170402.000|20101216170404.500|CCO|OUR STRATEGY ALSO RECOGNIZES 
20101216170404.500|20101216170407.000|CCO|THAT REBUILDING AFGHANISTAN IS A
20101216170407.000|20101216170409.500|CCO|GLOBAL COMMIT XHNT.

20101216170417.000|20101216170419.500|CCO|THE MANY OIC, THE ORGANIZATION 
20101216170419.500|20101216170422.000|CCO|OF ISLAMIC COUNTRIES, THAT HAVE

20101216170424.000|20101216170426.000|CCO|INTERNATIONAL CONTACT GROUP KNOW
20101216170426.000|20101216170428.000|CCO|THAT HELPING THE AFGHAN PEOPLE 
20101216170428.000|20101216170430.000|CCO|AND STANDING UP AGAINST VIOLENT 
20101216170430.000|20101216170432.000|CCO|EXTREMISM IS ESSENTIAL FOR THE 
20101216170432.000|20101216170434.000|CCO|REGION AND THE WORLD.
20101216170434.000|20101216170436.000|CCO|THIS ALIRNMENT OF OUR 
20101216170436.000|20101216170438.000|CCO|INTERNATIONAL EFFORT WAS ON FULL
20101216170438.000|20101216170440.000|CCO|DISPLAY IN LISBON LAST MONTH
